CustomField.formula: IF (OR(AND((ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Effect")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Renewed")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Amended")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Activated")))), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningAgreementRenew?id=" & Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Renew", "Renew"),"_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementRenew?id=" & Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Renew", "Renew"),"_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: Renew
